description:
Luffy crosses paths with the clever thief Nami. A navigator on a quest to collect one hundred million berries, she’s perfect for Luffy’s new crew – except for the fact that Nami hates pirates.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Terrifying Mysterious Power! Captain Buggy, the Clown Pirate!
Kyoufu Nazo no Chikara! Kaizoku Douke Buggy-Senchou!
Pouvoirs mystérieux épouvantables ! Capitaine Baggy le Clown !
Какой ужас, таинственная сила! Пират-клоун, капитан Багги!
ความกลัว! พลังแห่งผลปิศาจ! กัปตันโจรสลัดตัวตลกบากี้ปรากฏตัว!
恐怖 神秘的力量！海贼小丑巴基船长！
恐怖 謎の力! 海賊道化バギー船長!
공포 수수께끼의 힘! 해적 광대 버기 선장!
